column1: '''The Last Ship''' was a poem of the lore of [[the Shire]] originating in the [[Fourth Age]], and was probably derived from [[Gondor]].<ref>{{AB
It spoke about a woman, [[Fíriel (The Last Ship)
column2: Fíriel]], who was so beautiful that the [[Elves]] offered to carry her over the [[Straight Road]] to [[Valinor]], but she was unable to accompany them.<ref>{{AB

column1: The poem was written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and published in ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'' in [[1962]]. It is a revised edition of the poem ''[[Firiel (poem)
